content.description:
Simple! Traverse around the room either clockwise or counterclockwise. See how many laps you can do without stepping off!

 For a really fun challenge try and do it in under 1-minute. The record is supposedly around 30-seconds!
content.protection: No pads necessary! It is always close to the ground and easy to step off

content.description: This is a slightly scary highball immediately on the left side when you walk in. Climb up perfect hueco sand pockets stepping off onto the boulder once high enough to do so easily. Guidebook says V2 - feels much easier.
content.protection: Pad would only be helpful for the first few feet - best to not fall
content.location: Line of huecos on the left side immediately when you walk in

content.description: While it has a limited number of problems and a somewhat long hike in, the Round Room is a unique spot unlike anywhere else. The highlight is the Round Room Traverse
